# vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatDepthFloat32

**Case**

A 32-bit depth pixel format that describes the distance to an object in meters.

## Declaration

```swift
case formatDepthFloat32
```

## Depth format constants

- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatDepthFloat16**: A 16-bit depth pixel format that describes the distance to an object in meters.
